meanings.definition: The quality or state of being revengeful.
meanings.sent1: Her revengefulness was evident in the way she plotted against her enemies.
meanings.sent2: His revengefulness caused him to hold grudges for years.
meanings.sent3: Despite her revengefulness, she always found a way to forgive and forget.
meanings.sent4: The revengefulness in her eyes made it clear that she would not back down.
meanings.sent5: The revengefulness in his heart consumed him, driving him to seek retribution.

meanings.sent1: His revengefulness was triggered when he felt betrayed by his friend.
meanings.sent2: The revengefulness in her nature made her quick to retaliate.
meanings.sent3: Even in a game, his revengefulness showed when he lost a round.
meanings.sent4: The revengefulness in her actions spoke louder than words.
meanings.sent5: The revengefulness in his demeanor was palpable, causing unease among his peers.
